SEARCH
Package teapot_rocket.utils

Class ComponentBase

java.lang.Object
teapot_rocket.utils.ComponentBase
public final class ComponentBase extends Object
The ComponentBase class represents the basic attributes of a component used in rocket construction. It encapsulates properties such as name, dimensions (width and height), weight, and material. This class is immutable, meaning its fields are set once during construction and cannot be changed afterwards.

  • Constructor Details

    • ComponentBase

      public ComponentBase(String name, double width, double height, double weight, Material material) throws IllegalArgumentException, NullPointerException
      Constructs a new ComponentBase with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the component (must not be empty or null)
      width - The width of the component in meters (must be positive)
      height - The height of the component in meters (must be positive)
      weight - The weight of the component in kilograms (must be positive)
      material - The material of the component, specified by Material (must not be null)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameters are invalid
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null
